description: The parameters for generating a porting orders CSV report.

filters.description: The filters to apply to the export porting order CSV report.

status__in.description: The status of the porting orders to include in the report.

customer_reference__in.description: The customer reference of the porting orders to include in the report.

created_at__lt.description: The date and time the porting order was created before.

created_at__gt.description: The date and time the porting order was created after.
